last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Song
last_episode_to_air.overview: After the news of Robert's illness breaks, Guillermo and Maribel organize a farewell concert in his honor. Meanwhile, Robert plans his own surprise.

name: 45 RPM
overview: The birth of a music label and three characters fighting for their dreams inside the complex inside the music industry.

episodes.name: Futura
episodes.overview: Music producer Guillermo Rojas discovers talented rock singer Robert, and teams up with his assistant Maribel to launch a new sub-label, Futura.

episodes.name: The License
episodes.overview: Robert auditions for a license to perform professionally, but Guillermo's past interferes. Maribel learns her new friend's devastating secret.

episodes.name: The Single
episodes.overview: When Guillermo struggles to find a studio to record Robert's new single, Maribel comes to the rescue with an unorthodox idea. Ignacio makes a decision.

episodes.name: The Campaign
episodes.overview: Maribel and Robert start to feel a deeper connection just as the singer's career begins to take off. Guillermo's past mistakes catch up with him.

episodes.name: The Album
episodes.overview: A slew of challenges vex the team as they try to record Robert's new album, and Maribel is faced with both sexism at work and lies at home.

episodes.name: The Concert
episodes.overview: Maribel runs point as Robert prepares for his important concert at the Price, but an unexpected lawsuit involving Ignacio puts all of Golden in peril.

episodes.name: The Movie
episodes.overview: Sparks fly when Robert is cast in a movie opposite a famous actress. Maribel anxiously awaits medical results. Zabala worries about Golden's future.

episodes.name: The Tour
episodes.overview: Before Robert and his band tour Spain, Vidal tells the singer to fake a relationship with Fanny. Guillermo helps Zabala with his fleeing artists.

episodes.name: The Premiere
episodes.overview: Vidal instructs Robert and Fanny to keep lying about being in love to promote their film, but the press catches wind of Robert's romance with Maribel.

episodes.name: The Debut
episodes.overview: Ignacio is arrested with no hope of release, unless Robert performs at a military party. Maribel hires an assistant. Guillermo spends time with his son.

episodes.name: The Offer
episodes.overview: A tragic death leaves Golden's future uncertain, so Guillermo and Zabala scramble to raise money to save it. Robert is offered a record deal in London.

episodes.name: The Competition
episodes.overview: Robert feels cornered when the government requests he enter a singing competition to represent Franco's regime. Ángeles and Guillermo reminisce.

episodes.name: The Last Song
episodes.overview: After the news of Robert's illness breaks, Guillermo and Maribel organize a farewell concert in his honor. Meanwhile, Robert plans his own surprise.
